I think he's testing some kinda bug with the blank portraits.
GVDHSJ FKAHAHC JWHHJ CAGHGCGAPON 65
...Hey, Leo. Your people would tell you if they caught a suspect, right?
Huh? I'd hope so, yeah. Why?
Just- if there's a fourth person involved in this case, it'd throw out a lot of our logic.
...I'll check.
Captain Wirebrush, any update on the perimeter?
...Yeah, well, kids'll do that.
...Uh-huh. Nothin' from the building though, right?
Yeah. ...No. Yeah.
Yeah, I got it. Just checkin' in.
...Yeah, I know. Just have someone go for coffee, or somethin'. I'm feelin' it too.
...No, Dan, I don't need any up here.
Actually, I'd appreciate some coff-
No, yeah, we're all set up here. Don't bring us nothin'.
Nothin'. Doesn't look like there's anyone else involved- or at least, we ain't caught 'em.
Rats. Okay, something else, then.
